00032 void SubBarAlbumClock::xSetup()
00033 {
00034    //DAVID Setup Background;
00035    pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/SubBarBackground.png");
00036    setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00037    
00038    //InitBtn Graphic
00039    btnGraphic[0]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Album.png");
00040    btnGraphic[1]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Album-Active.png");
00041    btnGraphic[2]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Clock.png");
00042    btnGraphic[3]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Clock-Active.png");
00043    btnGraphic[4]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Previous.png");
00044    btnGraphic[5]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Previous-Active.png");
00045    btnGraphic[6]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Play.png");
00046    btnGraphic[7]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Play-Active.png");
00047    btnGraphic[8]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Pause.png");
00048    btnGraphic[9]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Pause-Active.png");
00049    btnGraphic[10]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Next.png");
00050    btnGraphic[11]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Album-Btn-Next-Active.png");
00051    //Init Btn
00052    SubBarBtnAlbumClock=new SkinButton(this);
00053    SubBarBtnAlbumClock->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[0],btnGraphic[1]);
00054    SubBarBtnAlbumClock->setGeometry(457,0,80,80);
00055    SubBarBtnAlbumClock->show();
00056    
00057    SubBarBtnPrevious=new SkinButton(this);
00058    SubBarBtnPrevious->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[4],btnGraphic[5]);
00059    SubBarBtnPrevious->setGeometry(175,0,60,80);
00060    SubBarBtnPrevious->show();
00061    
00062    SubBarBtnPlayNPause=new SkinButton(this);
00063    SubBarBtnPlayNPause->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[6],btnGraphic[7]);
00064    SubBarBtnPlayNPause->setGeometry(240,0,80,80);
00065    SubBarBtnPlayNPause->show();
00066    
00067    SubBarBtnNext=new SkinButton(this);
00068    SubBarBtnNext->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[10],btnGraphic[11]);
00069    SubBarBtnNext->setGeometry(323,0,60,80);
00070    SubBarBtnNext->show();
00071    
00072    QObject::connect(SubBarBtnAlbumClock,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotChangeMode()));
00073    QObject::connect(SubBarBtnPlayNPause,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotChangePlayNPauseBtnGraphic()));
00074   // slideshowstate=AlbumControl::GO;
00075 
00076 }
00077 
00078 void SubBarAlbumClock::slotChangeMode()
00079 {
00080   
00081   // +3 make the value init form em_dispaly_album (3)
00082   //qWarning("~~~~~~~~%d",GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE);
00083   GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE++;
00084   GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE%=2;
00085   GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE=GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE+3;
00086   ChangeButtonGraphic(GlobalSetting.intHDASS_ALBUMCLOCK_STATE);
00087 }
00088 void SubBarAlbumClock::ChangeButtonGraphic(int Mode)
00089 {
00090     qWarning("~~~~~~~~%d",GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);
00091     emit signalAlbumClockModeChangeToDispalyArea(GlobalSetting.intHDSS_DISPLAY_STATE);
00092    if(!Mode)//Album
00093    SubBarBtnAlbumClock->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[0],btnGraphic[1]);
00094    else//Clock
00095    SubBarBtnAlbumClock->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[2],btnGraphic[3]);
00096  
00097 }
00098 void SubBarAlbumClock::slotChangePlayNPauseBtnGraphic()
00099 {
00100   if(slideshowstate==SubBarAlbumClock::STOP)
00101  {
00102   slideshowstate=SubBarAlbumClock::GO;
00103   SubBarBtnPlayNPause->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[6],btnGraphic[7]);
00104  }
00105  else
00106  {
00107   slideshowstate=SubBarAlbumClock::STOP;
00108   SubBarBtnPlayNPause->setPixmaps(btnGraphic[8],btnGraphic[9]);
00109  }
00110 }
